name: HelpTheGranny
description:
Game created for the 2022 20 Second Game Jam.

In 'HelpTheGranny', you will have to help a granny by giving her directions on how to reach her destination in less than 20 seconds.

Controls: mouse (left button) and keyboard (arrows, x, m).

Available languages: English.

If you find any errors, do not hesitate to write a comment or a message to me explaining what happened.
